meanings.definition: The quality or state of being lush.
meanings.sent1: The lushness of the garden was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The lushness of the forest was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The lushness of the park made the squirrels dance with joy.
meanings.sent4: The lushness of the meadow was like a soft green blanket.
meanings.sent5: The lushness of the landscape painted a picture of abundance.

meanings.definition: A lush or abundant growth of vegetation.
meanings.sent1: The tropical rainforest displayed a lushness of greenery.
meanings.sent2: The vineyard's lushness produced the finest grapes.
meanings.sent3: The lushness of the jungle hid many colorful birds.
meanings.sent4: The lushness of the field whispered of nature's generosity.
meanings.sent5: The lushness of the orchard was a symphony of leaves and fruits.

meanings.definition: The quality of being rich or luxurious.
meanings.sent1: The lushness of the fabric spoke of elegance.
meanings.sent2: The mansion's lushness was evident in every detail.
meanings.sent3: The lushness of the dessert tempted even the strictest dieter.
meanings.sent4: The lushness of the hotel room felt like a royal retreat.
meanings.sent5: The lushness of the spa treatment was pure indulgence.
